Future of Psychiatry Treatment
Measurment based care assistant
Introducting Mitram. A measurment informed treatment assistant for mental health.

Our Mission
What is Mitram and how does it help patients and clinicias.
Improve Outcomes
Program utilizes psychiatry scale results to generate intelligent, algorithmic derived psychotropic medication.
Measure Progress
Smart phone-based machine learning platform which will assist primary care physicians, nurse practicioners, and psychiatrists.
Innovate Psychiatry
First comprehensive digital-based platform capturing quantifiable psychiatric treatment responses while driving objectively informed interventions.
Provide value
Increased efficiencies, enhance collaboration between provides and patients, and improve outcomes.
How Mitram helps?
Mitram help clinicians and patients through it's dedicated applications.
Who it helps?
Built to personalize, and better measure mental treatment.
Helping doctors prescribe right medication
Increased efficiencies, enhance collaboration between providers and patients, and improve outcomes.
Delivering personalized recommendations on medication
Increased efficiencies, enhance collaboration between providers and patients, and improve outcomes.
Reminding patients of their medication schedule
Increased efficiencies, enhance collaboration between providers and patients, and improve outcomes.
Right medication, at right time
Increased efficiencies, enhance collaboration between providers and patients, and improve outcomes.
How Mitram helps?
Customizable prescriber and administrator dashboards to convey meaningful objective data and treatment guidelines.
Our belief
"The uptake and integration of health technology has the potential to increases the quality of care that all patients can receive."
